title: Launcher Will Not Patch 6.15
body:
I've done everything in this post, http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/PINB3ovq-having-issues-patching-615-click-here, but nothing worked.



[Flame Suit]

toggleflamesuit 1

[Boredom Level]

boredom 9999

replies.body:
Patch 6.15 is not out yet. As the post you linked states, the thread will be unlocked for comments once the patch is live. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Regarding the patching, and this game in general, I've never gotten a clear answer to this: I have all my games on a dedicated SSD (Samsung 840 PRO 512GB)...with how much does this actually affect the loading times of this game (estimate, minutes - multiple factors applies, obviously)?

My ingame loading percentage usually goes from 0 to 100 in ~14 seconds, but can I improve that, I'd like to know how.

>Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc

Also (and I will come as quite a dick here), I am having a huge laugh everytime I see someone complaining about "patch stuck at 33%!!", when in most cases it's just their HDD(s) that's...slow. 

So, please put an SSD under system requirements:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements

...as the recommended install drive-type.

_Full client repair in sub-17 minutes!_ <3

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

>"_My computer's so fast, it finishes an infinite loop in 5 minutes._"

17 minutes? I thought this was 2016 when computers with SSD can repair the game in <7 minutes.


As for your question on how to improve your loading times; the new client will preload assets of the game before you enter the loading screen, so everybody will load faster. ;)

>17 minutes? I thought this was 2016 when computers with SSD can repair the game in <7 minutes.

Fair enough - from what I recall, last time I did a repair, it was when I had modded my client so bad it shouldn't really work at all.
..._Which it stopped doing soon after, so I had to reinstall anyway._ :/

>As for your question on how to improve your loading times; the new client will preload assets of the game before you enter the loading screen, so everybody will load faster.

Finally! This feature has been long awaited! Does this mean I can take the entire LoL folder and put it into my RAM (lol, I wish!)? I got enough of that.
_Take this 32GB RAM and stick it...somewhere useful._ ;)

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=696OB0wh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T02:11:17.158+0000)
> Finally! This feature has been long awaited! Does this I can take the entire LoL folder and put it into my RAM? I got enough of that. xD
> _Take this 32GB RAM and stick it...somewhere useful._

I don't think you would be able to lol.

Well, there is this thing called "RAM-disks"...but even setting aside some of the system memory and create one of those, you'd still be limited to the speed of the server-side data communication (which would act as a major bottleneck, as I doubt this game's servers is made up entirely of SSDs...).

And btw, regarding the repair time, 17 minutes is much better than the 45-60 minute repair time I've read some complain about. ^^
_You're tempting me now - I wanna do another repair, fur teh lulz, with the stopwatch out..._
Lol, don't stress your comp unnecessarily with another repair.

I thank you for your concern, but trust me; my computer can take it. ^^

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1px6cxlcgwjgla8/Speccy%20-%20Archon.jpg?dl=0

Details:
http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/off-topic-en/fQOqgEgz-show-your-set-up?comment=0001

I did some calculations on my OS SSD a couple years back, and with my current use and wear, it would last me about 40 years (checked with 3 different programs, and took an average). xD
_A life expectancy which was reset last week, as I replaced my Intel 520 240GB with an Intel 540 240GB._

And to put it this way: I expect the delivery of my [Asus Strix GTX 1080 OC](http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814126103) shortly, so I don't save money on any of my computer components. ;)
A library of storage, nice lol!!

Like I wrote in my novel...ehm, _hardware listing_, it's, you know, "in case the internet goes down". ^^
_Best explanation I've found so far with what I am to do with so much storage..._
